sentences: Lapsed on juba suured ja kasvanud.
PÃµllumajanduses kasvavad taimed on kasvanud headelt.
context: The word 'kasvanud' is the past participle form of the Estonian verb 'kasvama', which means 'to grow'. It describes something that has already grown, developed, or been raised. This could refer to physical growth (like children growing up), development over time, or cultivation of plants.
